name: History and Culture of the Greek World
description: A survey of the history and culture of the Greek world from the Minoan period to the Roman conquest of Egypt (ca 1500-30 BC). Special attention will be dedicated to the nature, variety and limits of the available evidences, to socio-cultural interactions as well as to historical processes of continuities and ruptures. Same as CLAB05H3 0.50 pre-1800 credit Ancient World Area
